1355  if(build_succeeded) {

1357  last_task = combine_tasks(my_graph, last_task, new_task);
1358  if(new_task) {
1359  tuple_accepted();
1360  }
1361  else {
1362  tuple_rejected();
1363  build_succeeded = false;
1364  }
1365  }
